topic.title: General Management
topic.section: When a Conference Manager logs in and visits the Conference Site Management page, they will first see a number of items listed under the General Management heading. They can {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement" text="set up"} the overall hosted conference website; {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.scheduledConferences" text="schedule"} a conference; review {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.emails" text="prepared emails"}; configure the {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.readingTools" text="reading tools"}; {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.filesBrowser" text="browse files"} uploaded to the system; check and configure {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.languages" text="languages"}; configure and browse the {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.eventLog" text="event log"}; and configure {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.plugins" text="system plugins"}.
